creator: MMS Products
descriptionHtml:
GooZam App is a first response mobile emergency and non-emergency service collaboration, hailing, messaging and resource app that allows response and interaction from GeoVolunteers (volunteers within a proximity radius). The app will call the emergency first response phone number configured for your area, SMS those in your "Emergency Contacts" list a preset emergency message with your location and hail a volunteer to come to your aid if there are any within the area. There are now additional messaging channels such as Facebook post and email sent to your insurance company that you can enable to function simultaneously with the base service.

The objective of the app is to get you rapid help in an emergency or semi-emergency situation through simultaneous means such as phone call, SMS, the internet, facebook, email and GeoVolunteers (volunteers nearby). In areas where there is no first response infrastructure like a centralized 911 or similar services, we are hoping that through your emergency contacts, volunteers and volunteer organizations, Facebook friends hailed and available in your area will make a difference in providing you help.

The app will work with basic mobile phone services. The app will function without internet data services, however, it will be limited to phone and SMS services only if those are the services that you currently have with your mobile phone service carrier. GPS is to be on for optimal results and for location services to aid in finding you. If you enable the Facebook feature to post in your “Settings”, you must log in to Facebook for the feature to function.

You must turn on GPS, fill your "Emergency Contacts" list and configure in the "Settings" menu the desired phone number(s) for your area for better results in response.

There is a server portal component which your organization can use to further enhance your first response functions.
descriptionShort: GooZam is a geo-context first response app that hails GeoVolunteers to help.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Added Ability to Schedule Service Tickets
* Added Service Forms
* Review for Service Tickets
* Bug Fixes
* Performance Improvements

title: GooZam

creator: MMS Products
descriptionHtml:
Why run errands when you can sit back, relax, and let us do the job for you? You want it? We get it.


GooZam is a community-driven call-for-help platform founded to build rapid response action for emergency and on-demand services. We bring together a network of product and service providers, from immediate emergency response, orders on essential supplies, trusted service bookings, and speedy parcel delivery to meet customer needs anytime, anywhere.


• Parcel Delivery - Get help with transportation and deliveries. Registered GooDrivers in the vicinity will be notified when a rider is requested.

• Essential Products - Have your orders delivered right to your doorstep! Choose from a number of restaurants, groceries, pharmacies, and more.
Essential Services - Book your favorite services and skip the long queue. Why go to the mall when you can have services done in the comfort of your own home?

• Emergency Request - Ask for help during an emergency! Whatever the situation you're in, a good samaritan is always willing and ready to respond.


It's all here! All in one platform.


Here's how to get started:
1. Sign in to GooZam Super App
2. Choose from our list of services
3. Start placing your urgent request or ordering your favorites!
4. Sit back, relax, and wait.
descriptionShort: Discover online ordering, curbside appointments, parcel delivery, and more!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* First Responders
* Chat
* Deliveries
* Orders & Bookings
